InitialFeedbackHistory:
25/04/2024
Dear, 
Your dmp is a typical one for a researcher in the field of mathematics. A few remarks:
- The way you described your data in the table under Data Summary is as good as it gets for your subject. Well done.
- Under documentation I wouldn't say too much about where the articles will be stored and kept but rather say a bit more explicitly that no extra documentation is needed because everything you need to know is included in the articles.
- As all your data is contained in articles you might mention the use of schemes such as the Mathematical Subjects Classificattion.
- When you mention active use of the data under "Where will the data be stored?" you might be a bit more explicit about what active use means, f.e. the preparation of the manuscripts.
Best regards,
Mark Verbrugge
label: good with suggestions
